Third party libraries
---------------------

The libraries in this directory are not accessible via a Maven
repository and are bundled with the sources for reasons of simplicity.

They come from the following packages:

GermaNet API and GermaNet relatedness API (GPL 3)
http://www.sfs.uni-tuebingen.de/lsd/tools.shtml

The BRICS Automaton library
http://www.brics.dk/automaton/index.html

Oliver Steele's WordNet API
-- does not seem to be on the internet anymore?

Scott Ananian's JUtil library (GPL)
http://cscott.net/Projects/JUtil/jutil-1.4/
